item.p: The style attribute takes a space-separated list of style hints. Processing tools should adjust their rendering according to those style hints they understand.
The link element can have attributes from external namespaces. See for more information on external-namespace attributes on inline elements.

The xref attribute creates a link to another page or section within the same document. When text content is omitted, the content is automatically taken from the title of the page or section being linked to.
The dref attribute creates a link to a page or section in another document. An href attribute can be provide as a fallback for systems that don't understand document links.
The href attribute creates a link to a web page or other network-accessible resource.
